article.name: summon-sprite
article.contents:
--- pact: fey name: Summon Sprite description: Summon tiny sprites that can do a few things (cause damage, manipulate objects, create minor illusions) ---
# Summon Sprite
Summon tiny sprites that can do a few things (cause damage, manipulate objects, create minor illusions)
